newsitem.title: USA: Intl Alliance Services names Greg Skoda CFO.
newsitem.headline: Intl Alliance Services names Greg Skoda CFO.

text.p: International Alliance Services Inc said Wednesday it appointed Greg Skoda, CPA, as the company's first chief financial officer.
Skoda is a shareholders in the private CPA firm SMR & Co, which International Alliance had agreed to acquire, a statement from the company said.
The statement said that for nine years Skoda has provided accounting and consulting services to the Century Surety Group, is a subsidiary of International Alliance.
